project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project structure and requirements (e.g., install requests library)
Implement functionality to fetch weather data from a public API
Parse the weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement functionality to display the fetched information in the terminal
Write tests for the API fetching and data parsing functionalities
Execute tests to ensure all functionalities work as expected
